abstract: Druse protesters attack Israeli military ambulance in Golan Heights; drag out two men who were wounded in Syrian civil war, killing one and critically injuring other.
lead_paragraph: It was the second time in 24 hours that Druse protesters stopped Israeli ambulances, amid mounting anger in their communities over the rebel assaults on Druse villages on the Syrian side.

headline.main: One Dead as Druse Attack Israeli Ambulance in Golan Heights
headline.print_headline: Druse Attack Israeli Ambulance in Golan

snippet: It was the second time in 24 hours that Druse protesters stopped Israeli ambulances, amid mounting anger in their communities over the rebel assaults on Druse villages on the Syrian side.
